template.text:
Application received %applicationId%#
We have received your application to register as building inspector with the Building Safety Regulator (BSR).
 
 
Your application reference number is %applicationId%.
We have attached a copy of your application (PDF) for you to save.
 
What happens next
 
We will email you if we require further information. You must respond to any email request within 28 days of when it was sent for your application to be continued. If you do not respond within 28 days, your application will be rejected and you will have to reapply. 
 
We will tell you of the outcome of your application by email. If we do not email you, or if you have any questions about the process, contact BSR, quoting your reference number: %applicationId%
